EmailTemplate.name: Subprocessor notification.Subprocessor notification March 2019
EmailTemplate.subject: Notice of updates to the Pivotal Tracker subprocessor list
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Important Update Notice of updates to the Pivotal Tracker subprocessor list Hello - We are writing to let you know that we've updated the list of third party service providers who are subprocessors of Tracker data as follows: Service provider
Processing performed by the service provider
Stripe
Payment processing
Frame.ai
Customer feedback analysis
Profitwell
Paid subscription metrics
Salesforce
Sales productivity and invoicing
To see the rest of the list, please visit the GDPR and Data Security article <[[https://www.pivotaltracker.com/help/articles/gdpr_and_data_security/]]> in the Tracker Help Center.
If you have any questions, please reply to this message or email tracker@pivotal.io. Thanks... The Tracker Team
You have received this mandatory email service announcement to update you about changes to the Pivotal Tracker subprocessor list, in compliance with the GDPR.
